title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action "Add Javadoc Comment" until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions available in the context menu appear to be distributed based on personal preference. This should be changed to ensure clarity for users. It is not clear why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. It is unacceptable to force users to switch views to access certain actions.
OB: The action "Add Javadoc Comment" is not available in the context menu.
EB: I expected the action "Add Javadoc Comment" to be available in the context menu.
SR: 1. Open the editor. 2. Select some text. 3. Right-click to open the context menu and observe the actions available. 4. Expected action "Add Javadoc Comment" is missing.
